item.title: By: Interview: Three Dimensions of Integration | Collidoscope Berlin

item.description: […] dual American-Polish citizen may appear to fit into a few niches: creative type with a studio in trendy Kreuzberg, one of a rapidly growing number of young Jews in Berlin, jetsetter popping between speaking […]
